item.title: Tzaar pits ^DIEING^
item.dc:creator: @t0xicn3ss t0xicn3ss
item.description:
@t0xicn3ss wrote:

okay ive almost completed my fight pits on my server…but i cant get my boolean to work…any help here is what im tryin to do, this code works fine its self explanitory this is under applydead()

else if ((IsInPit == true) { teleportToX = 2525; teleportToY = 2521; playerLevel[playerHitpoints] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerHitpoints]); setSkillLevel(playerHitpoints, playerLevel[playerHitpoints], playerXP[playerHitpoints]); }
that i was hopeing means if u die u teleport to 2525 2521 and ur hp goes back up, and u dont lose any items and this is the boolean;

public boolean IsInPit(){ if (absX >= 1242 && absX <= 2312 && absY >= 2241 && absY <= 2314) { return true; }
i was hopeing is gonna work but doesnt this is what i need help with could someone make a boolean that is in those cords that mean if u die there u go to the IsInPit Thing but it doesnt work could someone make one that works? thanks

also ive tried this one and it doesnt work…

[code]public void pitsafe1() {
if(absX >= 0000 && absX <= 0000 && absY >= 0000 && absY <=0000 ) {
pitsafe = true;
}}

public boolean pitsafe = false;[/code]

and

[code]pitsafe1();

if(pitsafe == true && IsDeadTimer == true){
teleportToX = 2399;
teleportToY = 5173;
NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
setSkillLevel(3, getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]), playerXP[playerHitpoints]);
playerLevel[3] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);
refreshSkills();
PoisonDelay = 9999999;
}[/code]

help please i cannot figure out what im doing rong
